description:
It`s the day of the WUG Fan Club bus tour. Since Minami`s stuck at work, the remaining six members do their best to entertain their fans.
While on the tour, Ayumi accidentally ends up inside a WUG animal costume and is taken to the hot springs by a confused Mayu...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitori demo WUG! 7 Nin demo WUG!
WUG toute seule, WUG à sept !
